# scroll(to:)

**Instance Method**

Changes the origin of the clip view’s bounds rectangle to `newOrigin`.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func scroll(to newOrigin: NSPoint)
```

## Scrolling

- **autoscroll(with:)**: Scrolls the clip view proportionally to `theEvent`’s distance outside of it.
- **constrainScroll(_:)**: Returns a scroll point adjusted from the proposed new origin, if necessary, to guarantee the view will lie within its document view.
- **constrainBoundsRect(_:)**: Constrains the bounds of the clip view while the user is magnifying and scrolling.
